title: Should i have to play a game im being flamed in?
body:
Before i say anything. If youre hear just say use the mute button or dont be a pussy, you can leave now :) Not interested in your opinion. 

As the title says. If im being flamed in a game should i have to continue to put up with it or should i be able to leave. I play league because i enjoy it. So when i start to not enjoy myself because of a certain person in game doing their best to ruin my fun, why should i continue to play that game?

replies.body:
fixed the 1st part for you. =)

Before i say anything. If youre hear _to give me a sensible solution_, you can leave now :) Not interested in _logical solutions_.

As the title says. If im being flamed in a game should i have to continue to put up with it or should i be able to leave. I play league because i enjoy it. So when i start to not enjoy myself because of a certain person in game doing their best to ruin my fun, why should i continue to play that game?

Well, putting everything in perspective, nothing is forcing you to EVER play league.
So you can just leave at anytime you want. The police won't turn up at your door.
So no, you don't HAVE to play.

It all just comes down to how much you respect the game.

If you belong to a sports team and you respect your team. You'll turn up to practice even if you don't quite feel like it, because you feel like you have a responsibility and a commitment to them.

This game is the same, if you enjoy the game, and feel like it is a part of your life, you wouldn't want others leaving while you were enjoying it! So you feel like it is your responsibility to see it through to the end, even if you aren't enjoying it, because that is what you'd expect of others.

But if you don't really care about the game, then sure just leave. You don't respect it and abandon it, it'll not respect you and will leave you with a penalty.

It's like a Dog, Kick it whenever you want, but you can't expect it to not bite you in your sleep! Feed it and cuddle it however, and it'll curl up nice and warm on your bed, _(even if it walked mud all through the house and you had to spend the day cleaning it up.)_

So you have to look at your personality and think "Do I kick the dog for walking mud in. Or do I put up with it because I enjoy those night-time cuddles."

and you'll have your answer to your question.

You cant Kick the dog AND have cuddles. Just like you cant leave the game whenever you want AND expect it to still be here for you whenever you want to play.

We all have to do things we don't enjoy sometimes for the benefit of others. If everyone left whenever they stopped having fun, there would literally be no game here for us to play.

You should definitely not rage quit due to a flaming teammate(s). 

Mute them all including the enemy team as well.

Focus on doing well yourself and winning the game, don't get sucked into the ingame chat argument it won't help.

You leaving the game would mean you let some people in your game 'win' by forcing you to leave the game. Stay strong and either be the mediator or ./all mute

It's a tough call, and even though my first suggestion is to use the mute button, I know it's not always that simple.

My thought is that if you decide to leave, you're making it even worse for the rest of the people in your game. Not just because that other person is flaming and generally (I assume) being a dick, but because suddenly it's a 4v5 and tbh I don't think either team really enjoys that.

Look at it this way - if you're tilted, and instead of enjoying the game you're just getting angrier at yourself, should you be able to leave? Would it be OK to ragequit? Absolutely not. 

It's part of the reason the surrender function is a good thing - and yes, I know he can just vote no - but it gives you a chance to end the game early without ruining the experience for anyone else.

News flash, Riot hasn't cared for 5 years! They promised an imaginary tribunal "coming soon" "we are working on it" LMFAO!

Only idiots will believe a word from Riot!

As long as Riot is making $$$$$$$$$$$$ they won't do A THING to change anything!

Why? because it would upset their shareholders NOT the people that play and support the game!

Sad but true!
